meanings.definition: Police officers who are exceptionally skilled or effective at their job.
meanings.sent1: The supercops quickly solved the case and arrested the criminal.
meanings.sent2: The supercops in the city are highly respected for their abilities.
meanings.sent3: The supercops were so good at catching thieves that they even caught a sneaky raccoon stealing cookies.
meanings.sent4: The supercops were like superheroes, swooping in to save the day.
meanings.sent5: The image of the supercops patrolling the streets stayed in everyone's minds.

meanings.definition: A group of law enforcement officers who are known for their exceptional abilities.
meanings.sent1: People always felt safe when the supercops were on duty.
meanings.sent2: The supercops received awards for their outstanding service to the community.
meanings.sent3: The supercops were so good at their job that even the birds sang their praises.
meanings.sent4: The supercops were like a well-oiled machine, working together seamlessly.
meanings.sent5: The supercops were the talk of the town for their incredible crime-solving skills.

meanings.definition: To act or behave like a supercop, displaying exceptional bravery or skill in law enforcement.
meanings.sent1: He decided to supercop his way through the dangerous mission, facing every challenge head-on.
meanings.sent2: She supercops whenever there is a crisis, always stepping up to help others.
meanings.sent3: The kids loved to play pretend supercops, chasing imaginary villains around the playground.
meanings.sent4: In the face of danger, he knew he had to supercop his way out of the situation.
meanings.sent5: She supercops with such determination that nothing can stand in her way.
